member.name: T:FlowDMApi.Api.Extensions.Log4net.Layout.XmlLayoutSchemaLog4j
member.summary: Layout that formats the log events as XML elements compatible with the log4j schema

remarks.para: Formats the log events according to the http://logging.apache.org/log4j schema.

member.author: Nicko Cadell

remarks.para: The LocationInfo option takes a boolean value. By default, it is set to false which means there will be no location information output by this layout. If the the option is set to true, then the file name and line number of the statement at the origin of the log statement will be output.
If you are embedding this layout within an SMTPAppender then make sure to set the LocationInfo option of that appender as well.

member.name: P:FlowDMApi.Api.Extensions.Log4net.Layout.XmlLayoutSchemaLog4j.Version
member.summary: The version of the log4j schema to use.

remarks.para: Only version 1.2 of the log4j schema is supported.

member.name: M:FlowDMApi.Api.Extensions.Log4net.Layout.XmlLayoutSchemaLog4j.FormatXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter,log4net.Core.LoggingEvent)
member.summary: Actually do the writing of the xml

remarks.para: Generate XML that is compatible with the log4j schema.
